title: Analyzing MOOCs' Impact on Higher Education: A Mixed-Methods Research Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of higher education systems and online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Analysis of MOOCs' educational effectiveness for language domain experts, emphasizing offline collaboration with digital tools

learning_goals: MOOC applications in higher education can be analyzed using mixed research methodologies (quantitative/qualitative).
Student engagement and attendance data generated during MOOC operations can be interpreted and evaluated.
Effective interaction strategies can be proposed for MOOC-based language education courses.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
